official_title: A bill to authorize increases in Federal Housing Administration mortgage ceilings under subsidized multifamily housing programs to meet construction costs.

summary.text: Authorizes increases in Federal Housing Administration mortgage ceilings under subsidized multifamily housing programs to meet construction costs. (Amends 12 U.S.C. 1715 l (d)(3))

titles.title: A bill to authorize increases in Federal Housing Administration mortgage ceilings under subsidized multifamily housing programs to meet construction costs.
